pages.text: their taming in equipping caravans (for traveling) in winter and summer
so let them serve the Lord of this house (Kaaba)
Who has fed them in hunger and given them security from fear
Did you see him who belies religion
Then he is the one who pushes away the orphan
and does not urge on the feeding of the poor
So sorrowful is the state of the worshippers
who are heedless of their worship (salat)
(in the sense that they are) those who make a show (of their worship)
so worship your Lord and sacrifice
The one who hates you, he is certainly without posterity
